text: waqss -ayha alrswl- ealaa kafaar "mk" khabar nuh -elyh alslam- mae qawmih hin qal lhm: 'iin kan eazum ealaykum maqami fikum watadhkiri 'iiaakum bhjj allah wbrahynh faealaa allah aetmady wabih thqty, faeddu amrkm, wadeuu shrka'km, thuma la tajealuu 'amrukum ealaykum msttrana bal zahrana mnkshfana, thuma aqduu ely baleqwbt walsuw' aldhy fi 'imkankm, wala tmhlwny saeatan min nhar
